thread.title: Juliette Leidel

author: Juliette Leidel
title: Juliette Leidel
text: Homeadvisor is a good place to start to find the right professional for the job you need. When I started working on my house and tried to find companies for various projects, I found myself staring at lists of companies. There were too many, and there was no way of telling which companies could do exactly what I needed. I would make calls and find out, "we don't do that". Homeadvisor is a great starting point offering lots of options.
